pkgmetadata.longdescription: Individual Diversity-Area Relationships // Computes and tests individual (species, phylogenetic and functional) diversity- area relationships, i.e., how species-, phylogenetic- and functional-diversity varies with spatial scale around the individuals of some species in a community. See applications of these methods in Wiegand et al. (2007) doi:10.1073/pnas.0705621104 or Chacon-Labella et al. (2016) doi:10.1007/s00442-016-3547-z.
